MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description: Gmagon aims to provide amazing simple and powerful solutions for you.
RoboSoft.Search_Engine_Search_String: Gmagon Gif, convert GIF to APNG on Mac

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: Gmagon Gif is the best GIF to APNG converter for Mac. It converts GIF to APNG.
Site.Site_Description_250: Gmagon Gif is the best GIF to APNG converter for Mac. It helps users convert GIF files to animated PNG on Mac easily with very good quality.
Site.Site_Description_450: Gmagon Gif is a minimum and streamlined converter that easily converts the GIF format out there to APNG format on Mac. In addition, it is also a multifunctional GIF tool including GIF gallery in its more advanced version. This GIF to APNG converter is the first version of a series of Gmagon GIF products for Mac. The software can intelligently recognize Gif files or directory and transform them to animated PNG files quickly.
Site.Site_Keywords: convert gif to apng on mac, mac gif to apng converter, gif to animated png converter for mac, gif to apng converter on mac
